Struggling to find a consistent posting schedule, resulting in irregular updates and a lack of engagement from readers.
Difficulty in building a loyal readership, despite producing high-quality content, due to the highly competitive nature of the fashion industry.
Struggling to monetize the blog through advertising or sponsorships, due to a lack of traffic or engagement.
Difficulty in creating engaging and relevant content, due to the rapidly changing nature of the fashion industry.
Struggling to balance the demands of running a blog with other aspects of life, such as work or family obligations.
